t: Amazon.com: Amazon Trail II : Video Games
s: A game designed to teach students about science and history of the Amazon rainforest. Kids learn by playing six games at three levels of difficulty. Topics include: the origins of commodities such as coffee, rice, and chocolate; the major rivers of the world; and 101 types of fish, birds and bugs.
